description:
Warmth and protection that doesn't sacrifice dexterity. The Geko Hot Evo Gloves wrap your hands in thermal insulation and a weatherproof membrane to handle cold environments. The palm insulation is thinner, with PrimaLoft Gold Eco Grip Control technology, ensuring an unrestricted grip on your ice tool or axe. Conducting thumb and index tips let you answer your phone at the belay without freezing your fingers.

  • DryZone® waterproof membrane protects hands from wind and moisture
  • Thumb and index finger are touch screen compatible
  • 3mm EVA finger inserts protect knuckles from impact
  • 100g PrimaLoft® Gold on backs, 60g PrimaLoft® Gold Eco Grip Control on palm
  • Hook-and-loop closure and elastic wrist cords provides a secure fit
  • Clippable loops to keep them together when not worn
name: Camp Geko Hot Evo Gloves - Men's
